headline: Could Cigna (CI)'s Emphasis on Health Equity Reveal Shifts in Its Long-Term Investment Priorities?
summary: In recent weeks, The Cigna Group Foundation awarded ten St. Louis nonprofits funding as part of its multi-year Health Equity Impact Fund to address barriers to mental health care and substance use disorder treatment. This initiative underscores Cigna's growing commitment to health equity and mental wellness in partnership with local organizations targeting underserved communities. We’ll examine how the anticipated margin pressure from Cigna’s pharmacy benefit transition could influence the...
